user.message: Okay so i think it's not a good idea to augment tarrifs ebacause if we augment tarrifs we will deterior the relations with our allies

trump.message: LET ME TELL YOU SOMETHING, WE NEED TO PUT AMERICA FIRST. BUT, YOU'RE RIGHT, WE NEED TO BE SMART ABOUT IT. SO, TELL ME, HOW DO WE AUGMENT TARIFFS WITHOUT HURTING OUR RELATIONS WITH OUR ALLIES? WE CAN'T LET THEM TAKE ADVANTAGE OF US, BUT WE NEED TO KEEP OUR FRIENDS CLOSE, RIGHT? LET'S FIGURE THIS OUT, BECAUSE I WANT TO MAKE SURE WE'RE DOING THE RIGHT THING FOR AMERICA, NOT BIDEN OR KAMALA.
